title: Rumble Galaxy Game Crashing Bug
body:
I noticed when I was playing tonight that when I was using my abilities I would sometimes crash.  This was a combination of shift clicking and using W/E/Q and it happened 4 times.  I've attached the logs and if you search for "crash" you can see where it failed.

In all 4 logs it looks something like this when it crashes

Function: HeroInventory::OnNetworkPacket

**Expression: inv.IData**

000530.323| 1383520.0000kb|   3268.0000kb added|   WARN| A HUD event is being identified in a deprecated way: Generic/button_click

000530.404| 1389488.0000kb|   5968.0000kb added|   WARN| A HUD event is being identified in a deprecated way: Generic/button_release

000530.408| 1389488.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|   WARN| A HUD event is being identified in a deprecated way: Generic/button_click

000541.441| 1388404.0968kb|  -1084.0000kb added|  ERROR| Error GameTargettingType wrong for (Name:ZedUltFakeMissile) (Display: ) (-1) 

[C:/jenkins/workspace/Code-CI-Releases-Public-Win32/code/Game/LoL/Spell/Data/SpellDataInst.cpp(101)] 

000541.441| 1388404.0968kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Assertion failed!

File: C:/jenkins/workspace/Code-CI-Releases-Public-Win32/code/Game/LoL/Spell/Data/SpellDataInst.cpp

Line: 104

Function: SpellDataInst::SetSpellData

Expression: mSpellTargeting.get()

**Description: ZedUltFakeMissile**

000542.007| 1388396.0032kb|     -8.0000kb added|   WARN| character Lucian does not have animation 'NONE' (spell 'Recall')

000542.008| 1388396.0032kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| >>> EffectHashMap::HashToName - Match not found for hash 0db19fc9

000546.126| 1377472.0000kb| -10924.0000kb added|   WARN| Attachment asked for a velocity on an object that no longer exists!

000546.128| 1377472.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|   WARN| Attachment asked for a velocity on an object that no longer exists!

000546.143| 1377472.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|   WARN| Attachment asked for a velocity on an object that no longer exists!

000551.840| 1387252.0968kb|   9780.0000kb added|  ERROR| >>> EffectHashMap::HashToName - Match not found for hash 0ed39129

000552.790| 1391096.0064kb|   3844.0000kb added|  ERROR| >>> EffectHashMap::HashToName - Match not found for hash 0ed39129

000553.907| 1391092.0968kb|     -4.0000kb added|  ERROR| >>> EffectHashMap::HashToName - Match not found for hash 0ed39129

000557.260| 1373592.0064kb| -17500.0000kb added| ALWAYS| MEMORY: Expression(pInfo) - Failed to allocate 26349804 bytes - LastError(8)

000557.910| 1377828.0968kb|   4236.0000kb added|  ERROR| Crash Occurred\

I was using the Rumble Galaxy Skin with Seeker's Arm, Sorc Boots with Homeguard, Liandrys, Rylai's, Abyssal, Amp Tome and yellow ward trinket.

In all cases I was basically mashing buttons to try and build my heat up as fast as possible and I was chasing zed during 3  of the times and taking down an inhib with Zed not around the 4th.

I also had on GQ's of AP, GM of Magic Pen, GS of scaling health and GG of Scaling AP.

**My Masteries were:**

**Offense 21**

* 1-0-3-1

* 0-0-3-0

* 0-0-1-3

* 0-0-3-1

* 0-3-1

* 1

**Defense 9**

* 2-2-0-0

* 1-3-0

* 0-1-0-0

replies.body: Is it possible that I might need to do a repair on the files because some might have come down corrupted or something or no?

Hey XDG VAKABIEL!


Having the game crash consistently, only when consistently using the same skin strongly points to one of two issues:  Either there was a corruption with certain assets associated with the champion, or due to this being a new skin, your computer requires the latest updates.  

I looked through all of the attached R3d Logs, and they all consistently show your crashing in the middle of the game.  From further review of your logs, it appears that your drivers for your Nvidia card are out of date.  Since this may very well be the root cause to your issue, I strongly recommend that you update your drivers, by downloading the latest ones here:


http://www.geforce.com/drivers/results/73780


Now, if you are still experiencing issues with these crashes, we will probably have to go pretty in-depth with your information in order to determine the root cause. In this case, please [submit a new ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us here in Player Support!  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following latest and most up to date information:

1) Dxdiag information: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5

2) Your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
